description.narrative: The project will improve the efficiency and effectiveness of interisland shipping services. This involves (i) the construction and repair of wharves and jetties, with associated facilities, in the national capital of Port Vila and five outer islands; and (ii) the establishment of a shipping support scheme (SSS) to catalyze the provision of services to remote noncommercial destinations using an output-based aid approach.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Private sector operators provide interisland shipping services that are reliable, safe, and adequately frequent.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
All vessels in Vanuatu comply with national safety regulations by 2017

description.narrative: Private sector operators provide interisland shipping services that are reliable, safe, and adequately frequent.

title.narrative: Main population centers in project areas receive a vessel call at least once every 2 months.

description.narrative: Private sector operators provide interisland shipping services that are reliable, safe, and adequately frequent.

title.narrative: Sailing schedules to all islands are published and 90% of vessel calls are delivered without cancellations or delays greater than 24 hours by 2017.
